text: A third man's house was watched for four days by plain-clothes men. Committee-member Mr. George Clark commented at a Press conference: "The most extraordinary things are happening." Fifty committee members will appear at Bow-street today, including Lord Russell, Lady Russell, Lord Boyd-Orr, the Rev. Michael Scott, and Mr. Clark.
